seo.title: Login to Z-Image | Start Creating for Free
seo.description: Join the Z-Image community. Get free daily credits to generate photorealistic AI images instantly.

hero.quote: The speed of Z-Image Turbo is mind-blowing. I generated this poster in less than a second, and the detail rendering is flawless.

page.signInText: Sign in to your account to get <highlight>{credits} free generations</highlight> today.
page.terms: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email address
errors.invalidPassword: The password you entered is incorrect
errors.socialLogin: This account uses social login. Please sign in with Google or GitHub
errors.generic: An error occurred during login. Please try again later
